title: I Was Reincarnated in a Modern Day Onmyoji Family - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Ecchi   School Life   Slice of Life   Supernatural
tags: Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Multiple POV   Onmyouji   Perverted Protagonist   R-15   Reincarnation
author: 爪隠し
description:
Hijiri was reincarnated in an ancient family that is actually a modern-day Onmyoji family. 

 “I want to become a celebrity so that someone will remember me.”

With this wish in mind, he is reincarnated and steadily grows stronger through a method of spiritual empowerment that only children can undertake.

In his spare time, he trains his spiritual power, learns the art of Onmyoji at an early age, and rises to professional status before anyone else.

This is a reincarnation story of a man who enjoys his second life, even though some of his wishes are a bit mundane.>
